problem_text:
Describe the finite groups generated by a conjugacy class D of involutions which satisfies the following property: if a, b ∈ D and |ab| = 4, then [a, b] ∈ D. This condition is satisfied, for example, in the case where D is a conjugacy class of involutions of a known finite simple group such that ⟨C_D(a)⟩ is a 2-group for every a ∈ D.
A. A. Makhn¨ev
